alert.note: Alert for Crawford; Sebastian (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 21 at 5:14PM CDT by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Crawford, northwestern Sebastian and southeastern Sequoyah Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 514 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 3 miles northeast of Moffett, moving south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations in or near the path include... Fort Smith... Van Buren... Roland... Arkoma... Moffett... Fort Smith Regional Airport... Mill Creek... Shibley... Dora... Furry... This includes the following highways, Interstate 40 in Arkansas between mile markers 0 and 8. Interstate 40 in Oklahoma between mile markers 323 and 328. Interstate 540 between mile markers 1 and 12. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
